org.firmata4j.firmata

Class FirmataI2CDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firmata4j.firmata.FirmataI2CDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I2CDevice

    public class FirmataI2CDevice
extends Object
implements I2CDevice
    Represents an I2C device and encapsulates communication logic using Firmata protocol.
    Author:
    Oleg Kurbatov <o.v.kurbatov@gmail.com>

        public void setDelay(int delay)

        Description copied from interface: I2CDevice
        Sets delay between writing and reading data to/from I2C device.
        Specified by:
        setDelay in interface I2CDevice
        Parameters:
        delay - delay between the moment the device is written to and the moment when the data can be read from it
        Throws:
        IOException - when delay cannot be set due to communication fail

      • ask

        public void ask(byte responseLength,
                I2CListener listener)
         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: I2CDevice
        Requests data from I2C device and receives it only once. Specified listener is exclusive processor of the received data.
        Specified by:
        ask in interface I2CDevice
        Parameters:
        responseLength - length of expected response
        listener - processor of the response
        Throws:
        IOException - when I2C device cannot be asked for data due to communication fail

      • ask

        public void ask(int register,
                byte responseLength,
                I2CListener listener)
         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: I2CDevice
        Requests data from I2C device and receives it only once. Specified listener is exclusive processor of the received data.
        Specified by:
        ask in interface I2CDevice
        Parameters:
        register - Device register to read from.
        responseLength - length of expected response
        listener - processor of the response
        Throws:
        IOException - when I2C device cannot be asked for data due to communication fail

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(I2CListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: I2CDevice
        Registers a listener as a receiver of regular updates from I2C device.
        The listener starts receiving updates after I2CDevice.startReceivingUpdates(int, byte) invocation.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface I2CDevice
        Parameters:
        listener - the object that receives updates

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(I2CListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: I2CDevice
        Unregisters a listener from receiving of regular updates from I2C device.
        Specified by:
        unsubscribe in interface I2CDevice
        Parameters:
        listener - the object that used to receive updates

      • startReceivingUpdates

        public boolean startReceivingUpdates(int register,
                                     byte messageLength)
                              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: I2CDevice
        Tells I2C device to send data continuously from specified register as it available.
        Specified by:
        startReceivingUpdates in interface I2CDevice
        Parameters:
        register - the device register to read from
        messageLength - length of expected message
        Returns:
        true if receiving updates just started or false otherwise (if it have been already going for example)
        Throws:
        IOException - when I2C device cannot be asked for data due to communication fail
